price: Então, vingamo-Nos deles e afogamo-los na onda, porque desmentiram Nossos sinais e a eles estiveram desatentos.
arabic: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَكَانُواْ عَنۡهَا غَٰفِلِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: fa-intaqamnā min'hum fa-aghraqnāhum fī al-yami bi-annahum kadhabū biāyātinā wakānū ʿanhā ghāfilīna
